data.name: Mass Harvest
data.detailed_description:
In your comfortable bed, free from responsibility and blessedly alone after a hard day’s work when you were ready to dive into your dreams; sirens blow off your mind. You rushed outside, only to witness to see the moon destroyed by an object you have never seen before. Suddenly clouds clamped up to each other and lights pierced through it. The alien ship appeared with a deafening voice that could blast your skull. You immediately run for your life and reach your bunker.

Key Features

Stand the test of time in an infested World! Scavenge and hide, be smart and avoid any confrontations. Fighting is an option, but you should avoid thinking about it unless you are ready to take them. Don’t forget that it’s an invasion army; they are here to harvest everything!
  • Maintain your bunker’s condition. Fix all vitals if they got broken. Craft items and tools to increase your survival chance.
  • Seek shelter if you can't manage to be back to your base. Believe me, you won't want to be caught in the open by their predators.
  • Search the land for food, weapons, or crafting materials to increase your chance to survive.
  • Craft weapons, explosives, and machinery to enhance your facility and capabilities.
  • Use stealth to evade enemies or engage them directly using a vast variety of arsenal.
  • Aliens use huge dome over the cities to change the weather and spot humans. They are sending units to capture them. They show no mercy to resistance. Sometimes they feed their animals with them!
data.about_the_game:
In your comfortable bed, free from responsibility and blessedly alone after a hard day’s work when you were ready to dive into your dreams; sirens blow off your mind. You rushed outside, only to witness to see the moon destroyed by an object you have never seen before. Suddenly clouds clamped up to each other and lights pierced through it. The alien ship appeared with a deafening voice that could blast your skull. You immediately run for your life and reach your bunker.

Stand the test of time in an infested World! Scavenge and hide, be smart and avoid any confrontations. Fighting is an option, but you should avoid thinking about it unless you are ready to take them. Don’t forget that it’s an invasion army; they are here to harvest everything!

data.short_description: The moon has been destroyed. Invasion has begun. Keep your bunker intact, explore the area to scavenge weapons, parts, food. Craft items and weapons to survive the terrifying invasion. Beware of the dome as it can reveal your location and change weather to risk your life.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-8100 / AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® UHD Graphics 630 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 2GB / AMD Radeon™ HD 7850 2GB
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Integrated GPUs require additional 2GB of system RAM. These estimates may change during final release.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-9600K / AMD Ryzen™ 5 3600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon™ RX 580
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These estimates may change during final release.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Violence, General Mature Content
